languages.text: Часть корабля была изолирована от остального судна до самого выхода из варпа. После выхода в реальный мир и распечатывания шлюзов отсек оказался абсолютно сохранен... кроме экипажа, который забаррикадировался в дальней части Пятого Погрузочного и до последнего сопротивлялся неизвестной твари. Останки безопасно утилизированы.

A part of the ship was isolated from the rest until it left the warp at the end of the journey. After the vessel emerged in realspace and the chamber was unsealed, it was intact... with the exception of the crew who had barricaded themselves in a far corner of Loading Bay 5 and bravely resisted the unknown assailant for as long as they could. Their remains have been safely disposed of.
languages.original_text: Часть корабля была изолирована от остального судна до самого выхода из варпа. После выхода в реальный мир и распечатывания шлюзов отсек оказался абсолютно сохранен... кроме экипажа, который забаррикадировался в дальней части Пятого Погрузочного и до последнего сопротивлялся неизвестной твари. Останки безопасно утилизированы.

With the exception of the crew that had barricaded itself in a far corner of Loading Bay Five and bravely resisted the unknown assailant for as long as it could. A part of the ship was isolated from the rest until it left the warp at the end of the journey. After the vessel emerged in realspace and the chamber was unsealed, it was intact... with the exception of the crew who had barricaded themselves in a far corner of Loading Bay Five and bravely resisted the unknown assailant for as long as they could. Their remains have been safely disposed of.

languages.text: 领主舰长下令，将发生事故的船舱与其他部分进行隔离，直到舰船驶出亚空间为止。当舰船返回到真实世界，解除封锁之后，发生事故的船舱依然完好无损……但那片区域里的船员则是另一回事了。船员们固守在五号装载区域的某个偏僻角落里，尽其所能地对付那个不知名的袭击者，直至生命的最后一刻。他们的遗体已被安全处理。
languages.original_text: A part of the ship was isolated from the rest until it left the warp at the end of the journey. After the vessel emerged in realspace and the chamber was unsealed, it was intact... with the exception of the crew who had barricaded themselves in a far corner of Loading Bay Five and bravely resisted the unknown assailant for as long as they could. Their remains have been safely disposed of.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长下令，将发生事故的船舱与其他部分进行隔离，直到舰船驶出亚空间为止。当舰船返回到真实世界，解除封锁之后，发生事故的船舱依然完好无损……但那片区域里的船员则是另一回事了。船员们固守在五号装载区域的某个偏僻角落里，尽其所能地对付那个不知名的袭击者，直至生命的最后一刻。他们的遗体已被安全处理。

languages.text: Una parte de la nave quedó aislada del resto hasta que abandonó la disformidad al final del viaje. Una vez que la nave emergió en el espacio real y se abrió la cámara, ésta quedó intacta... a excepción de la tripulación, que se atrincheró en un rincón alejado del Muelle de Carga Cinco y resistieron valientemente contra el asaltante desconocido durante todo el tiempo que pudieron. Sus restos han sido eliminados de forma segura.
languages.original_text: A part of the ship was isolated from the rest until it left the warp at the end of the journey. After the vessel emerged in realspace and the chamber was unsealed, it was intact... with the exception of the crew who had barricaded themselves in a far corner of Loading Bay Five and bravely resisted the unknown assailant for as long as they could. Their remains have been safely disposed of.

traits.locale_text: Una parte de la nave quedó aislada del resto hasta que abandonó la disformidad al final del viaje. Una vez que la nave emergió en el espacio real y se abrió la cámara, ésta quedó intacta... a excepción de la tripulación, que se atrincheró en un rincón alejado del Muelle de Carga Cinco y resistieron valientemente contra el asaltante desconocido durante todo el tiempo que pudieron. Sus restos han sido eliminados de forma segura.

languages.text: 航行の終わり頃、<歪み>を抜け出すまで、船の一部を他の部分から隔離した。船がリアルスペースに出て空間の封鎖を解くと、そこは被害を受けていなかった…ただし、ローディングベイ5のずっと端に自らをバリケードで囲い、できる限り正体不明の襲撃者に勇敢に抵抗したクルー達が犠牲になってしまう。彼らの遺体は安全に処分された。
languages.original_text: A part of the ship was isolated from the rest until it left the warp at the end of the journey. After the vessel emerged in realspace and the chamber was unsealed, it was intact... with the exception of the crew who had barricaded themselves in a far corner of Loading Bay Five and bravely resisted the unknown assailant for as long as they could. Their remains have been safely disposed of.

traits.locale_text: 航行の終わり頃、<歪み>を抜け出すまで、船の一部を他の部分から隔離した。船がリアルスペースに出て空間の封鎖を解くと、そこは被害を受けていなかった…ただし、ローディングベイ5のずっと端に自らをバリケードで囲い、できる限り正体不明の襲撃者に勇敢に抵抗したクルー達が犠牲になってしまう。彼らの遺体は安全に処分された。

languages.text: Une partie du vaisseau est mise en quarantaine jusqu'à la sortie du Warp. Une fois dans l'espace réel, les lieux semblent intacts... à l'exception de l'équipe qui s'est barricadée dans un coin isolé de la baie de chargement et qui a courageusement tenté de résister à l'assaillant inconnu. Leurs dépouilles ont été prises en charge comme il se doit.
languages.original_text: A part of the ship was isolated from the rest until it left the warp at the end of the journey. After the vessel emerged in realspace and the chamber was unsealed, it was intact... with the exception of the crew who had barricaded themselves in a far corner of Loading Bay Five and bravely resisted the unknown assailant for as long as they could. Their remains have been safely disposed of.

traits.locale_text: Une partie du vaisseau est mise en quarantaine jusqu'à la sortie du Warp. Une fois dans l'espace réel, les lieux semblent intacts... à l'exception de l'équipe qui s'est barricadée dans un coin isolé de la baie de chargement et qui a courageusement tenté de résister à l'assaillant inconnu. Leurs dépouilles ont été prises en charge comme il se doit.

languages.text: Ein Teil des Schiffs wurde vom Rest isoliert, bis das Schiff am Ende der Reise den Warp verließ. Nachdem das Raumschiff im Realraum ankam und die Kammer wieder geöffnet wurde, war sie intakt ... mit Ausnahme der Crew, die sich in der hintersten Ecke von Ladebucht 5 verbarrikadiert und den unbekannten Angreifer so lange wie möglich abgewehrt hatte. Ihre Überreste wurden unter Einhaltung aller Vorsichtsmaßnahmen entsorgt.
languages.original_text: A part of the ship was isolated from the rest until it left the warp at the end of the journey. After the vessel emerged in realspace and the chamber was unsealed, it was intact... with the exception of the crew who had barricaded themselves in a far corner of Loading Bay 5 and bravely resisted the unknown assailant for as long as they could. Their remains have been safely disposed of.

Ihre Überreste wurden unter Einhaltung aller Vorsichtsmaßnahmen entsorgt.
